Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul.
Darwin Oswaldo se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z, frÃ©jol, ademÃ¡s tiene animales como las cerdos. Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrÃ­colas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crÃ©dito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, lÃ­quido para plagas, insumos. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito mejorarÃ¡ el trabajo, Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. El sueÃ±o es comprarse terrenos para sembrar mucho mÃ¡s.
En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte
texts.en:
Darwin Oswaldo is 26 years old. He is single and does not have any children. He lives with his parents in the Ventanas canton, Los RÃ­os province.
He is a member of the NUEVO HORIZONTE communal bank. It located in the Cachely Grande precinct in the Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Darwin grows corn and beans. He also has animals like pigs. He buys and sells his agricultural products in Ventanas.
He is requesting this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and supplies. The support of this loan helps his work. He encounters challengers like plagues and diseases and variations in the climate. His dream is to purchase land in order to plan a lot more.
He likes to play sports in his free time.

loan.use: purchase seeds, fertilizers and supplies.

loan.name: Christian Ivan

texts.es:
Christian Ivan tiene 20 aÃ±os de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Ventanas provincia de los RÃ­os.
Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul.
Cristian se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z, arroz y cacao, ademÃ¡s crÃ­a animales como cerdos y pollos. Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrÃ­colas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crÃ©dito para utilizarlo en la agricultura y comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, lÃ­quido para plagas, insumos. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito podrÃ¡ mejorar el trabajo, Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas de langosta, las inundaciones y la variedad del clima. El sueÃ±o es crecer con el negocio y comprar tierras.

texts.en:
Christian Ivan, 20, is single and has no children. He lives with his parents in Ventanas, province of Los RÃ­os. He is a member of the Nuevo Horizonte communal bank located in the Cachely Grande precinct of Ventanas Canton. This bank focuses on short-cycle agricultural work such as growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas.
Christian works in agriculture growing corn, rice, and cacao. He also raises animals such as pigs and chickens. He buys and sells his agricultural products in Ventanas.
He is requesting the loan to use in farming buying seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide, and supplies. With the help of the loan he will be able to improve his work. He faces challenges such as plagues of locusts, floods, and temperature change. His dream is to grow with the business and buy land.
In his free time he likes to play sports.

loan.name: KuÃ±a Aty Group

texts.es: El ComitÃ© de Mujeres Rurales de la FundaciÃ³n Paraguaya a formado varios grupos en la ciudad de Curuguaty y el comitÃ© KuÃ±a Aty es uno mÃ¡s situado en el Barrio Santa Maria con el total de 15 mujeres en las cuales estÃ¡n vecinas, amigas y hermanas. Actualmente se encuentra en el segundo ciclo, es un comitÃ© que demuestra mucho interÃ©s con todos los programas que la FundaciÃ³n ofrece. Eloina es una mujer muy trabajadora, quien nos cuenta que por medio de la venta de todo tipo de verduras ha podido sacar adelante a su familia y ayudar con los gastos diarios de la casa. Ella sabe lo difÃ­cil que es mantener un hogar, y es por ello que dÃ­a a dÃ­a se esfuerza mucho. Cuenta que tiene buena venta, pues sus vecinos siempre compran de ella sus productos. Esta vez solicita la ayuda de kiva y de fundaciÃ³n paraguaya para la compra de verduras, como ser tomates, locotes, cebollas, papas, legumbres y demÃ¡s tipos, pues quiere abastecerse para tener siempre verduras que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The FundaciÃ³n Paraguaya's ComitÃ© de Mujeres Rurales [Rural Women's Communal Bank] program has formed various groups in the city of Curuguaty. The communal bank "KuÃ±a Aty" is a member group located in Barrio Santa Maria, composed of 15 women who are neighbors, friends, and sisters. They are currently on the second loan cycle. Their communal bank shows a lot of interest with all the programs offered by the Foundation.
Eloina (one of the members) is a very hardworking woman who sells vegetables. This has allowed her to move forward with her family and help with the daily house expenses. She knows how difficult it is to maintain her house, so she puts a lot of effort into it on a daily basis. Her sales are going well, since her neighbors always buy from her.
The loan requested to KIVA and the Fundacion Paraguaya will be used to buy vegetables, like tomatoes, chilies, onions, potatoes, legumes and other type of vegetables. This will help her to stock her store and continue offering vegetables to her customers.

loan.use: to buy tomatoes, chilies, onions, potatoes, legumes and other types of vegetables.

loan.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El seÃ±or JosÃ© nacido en Chuquisaca, actualmente vive y tiene su parcela en la localidad de Betanzos a 25 km de limoncito hacia el sur, el se dedica a la agricultura siembra: maÃ­z, sorgo, sandia, y tambiÃ©n se dedica a la producciÃ³n del carbÃ³n, todo lo que el siembra lo saca a vender al mercado de la zona, ya viene trabajando con emprender hace cinco crÃ©ditos, por que es la Ãºnica instituciÃ³n que le ha brindado un apoyo para mejorar su calidad de vida, por lo cual el cliente manifiesta que esta muy agradecido con la instituciÃ³n ya que con este dinero del crÃ©dito comprar semillas para la siembra de maÃ­z y tambiÃ©n lo utilizara en el preparado de la tierra para la siembra.
texts.en:
JosÃ©, born in Chuquisaca, currently lives and has his land in the community of Betanzos, 25 kilometers to the south of Limoncito. He works in agriculture growing corn, sorghum, and watermelon, and he also works producing charcoal. He takes everything he grows to the area market.
He has been working with Emprender for five loans because it is the only institution that has given him support to improve his quality of life. The client says he is very grateful to the institution for this because with the money from the loan he will buy seeds for the corn crop. He also will use it to prepare the land for planting.

loan.use: to buy seeds to grow corn.

loan.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras De Micaela Bastidas Group

texts.es: La seÃ±ora Maribel pertenece a la alcancÃ­a comunal Mujeres Triunfadoras de Micaela Bastidas conformada hace mas de 4 aÃ±os y estÃ¡ integrada por 8 participantes, los cuales son todos vecinos y radican en el distrito de Ate, un grupo con caracterÃ­sticas de Ã©xito y perseverancia en el desempeÃ±o de sus negocios, muestra de ello es la seÃ±ora Maribel de 42 aÃ±os de edad con tres hijos menores de edad a su cuidado y dependen de ella para su educaciÃ³n, alimentos y vestimenta. Ella diariamente se dedica a la venta de zapatos, tiene en este negocio 5 aÃ±os y comenzÃ³ a raÃ­z de un familiar (suegra) que vendÃ­a lo mismo, y le dejo el negocio a Maribel para que pueda salir a delante junto con sus hijos. Con el Ãºltimo prÃ©stamo lo invertirÃ¡ en compra de mÃ¡s calzados. En el futuro le gustarÃ­a ampliar mÃ¡s su negocio y abrir un local para venta de ropa de vestir.
texts.en: Maribel belongs to the community bank "Triumphant Women" from Micaela Bastidas formed more than four years ago and it has eight participants who are neighbours and live in the distrcit of Ate, a group characterized by success and perseverance in the way they do business; proof of it is Maribel, who is 42 and has three young children under her care and are dependent on her for their education, food and clothing. She sells shoes, has had this business for five years and started on it because her mother in law had the same business and passed it on to Maribel so she could get ahead with her family. With the last loan she will invest it in buying more shoes. In the future she would like to expand her business and open a clothing store.

loan.use: to buy shoes for sale

loan.name: Cruz Maria

texts.es:
Cruz MarÃ­a tiene 45 aÃ±os de edad vive en uniÃ³n libre tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 18, 17 y 4 aÃ±os de edad en Ventanas Provincia de los RÃ­os.
Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul.
Cruz MarÃ­a se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z. Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrÃ­colas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crÃ©dito para invertir en la agricultura comprando semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, lÃ­quido para plagas, insumos. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito aumentarÃ¡ los sembrÃ­os.
Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. El sueÃ±o es comprarse un terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta ver a los animales.

Cruz MarÃ­a, age 45, is in a common-law marriage and has three children. She lives with her husband and three children, ages 18, 17, and 4, in Ventanas in the Los Rios province.
She is a member of the â€œNuevo Horizonteâ€ (New Horizon) communal bank in the Cachely Grande precinct of the Ventanas canton. This communal bank devotes itself to the agricultural work of growing short cycle corn, rice, and pigeon pea beans.
Cruz MarÃ­a grows corn. She buys and sells her agricultural products in Ventanas.
She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and supplies. With the support of the loan her crops will increase. She faces challenges like pest infestations, diseases, and climate changes.
Her dream is to buy a piece of land. She likes to spend her free time with the animals.

loan.name: Martha VerÃ³nica

texts.es: Martha estÃ¡ por finalizar su carrera de QuÃ­mica Y Farmacia, el crÃ©dito solicitado es para el pago del curso de graduaciÃ³n de su carrera, actualmente labora en su campo en donde estÃ¡ poniendo en prÃ¡ctica todo lo aprendido. En un futuro le gustarÃ­a desempeÃ±arse como Visitadora MÃ©dica, siempre le ha gustado trabajar y no depender de nadie y su hija tambiÃ©n le inspira a salir adelante para brindarle lo mejor de ella. Hace algunos aÃ±os adquiriÃ³ su propia vivienda por la que quiere trabajar muy duro para terminar de pagarla.
texts.en: Martha is finishing her degree in chemistry and pharmacy. The requested loan is for the payment of a graduation course for her degree. Currently she works in the country where she is putting into practice everything she has learned. In the future, she would like to become pharmaceutical sales representative. She has always liked to work and she does not depend on anyone. Her daughter also inspires her to make progress in order to give her the best. A few years ago, she purchased a home. For this reason, she wants to work very hard to finish paying for it.

loan.use: pay for her graduation course.

loan.name: Ambar Liset

texts.es:
Ambar Liset tiene 26 aÃ±os de edad vive en uniÃ³n libre tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 3 y 8 aÃ±os de edad en ventanas provincia de los RÃ­os. Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul. Ambar Liset se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z, ademÃ¡s tiene cerdos, pollos. Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrÃ­colas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crÃ©dito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, lÃ­quido para plagas, insumos. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito mejorara el trabajo.
Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas cÃ³mo la langosta y la variedad del clima. El sueÃ±o es comprar un terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta cuidar de la casa y los animales.

Ambar Liset, age 26, is in a common-law marriage and has two children. She lives with her husband and two children, ages three and eight, in Ventanas in the Los Rios province.
She is a member of the â€œNuevo Horizonteâ€ (New Horizon) communal bank in the Cachely Grande precinct in the Ventanas canton. This communal bank devotes itself to the agricultural work of growing short cycle corn, rice, and pigeon pea beans.
Ambar Liset grows corn, and she also has pigs and chickens. She buys and sells her agricultural products in Ventanas.
She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and supplies. With the support of the loan her work will improve. She faces challenges like locusts and climate changes.
Her dream is to buy a piece of land. She likes to spend her free time taking care of the house and the animals.

loan.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and supplies.

loan.name: Claudia

texts.es: La seÃ±ora Claudia, se dedica a la costura de prendas de vestir femeninas, actualmente esta confeccionando blusas y vestidos, su domicilio se encuentra ubicado por el octavo anillo de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, esta viviendo en condiciÃ³n de anticrÃ©tico. Es una excelente trabajadora y emprendedora, con el tiempo desea tener un taller de costura mas grande y poder emplear mano de obra y asÃ­ comercializar sus productos en los diferentes mercados a nivel nacional ya que por ahora solo entrega a los distintos mercados de la ciudad de Santa cruz, con el dinero del crÃ©dito comprara tela e hilos para la confecciÃ³n de prendas de vestir ya que tiene un pedido que entregar. La Sra. Claudia agradeciÃ³ por el apoyo brindado y por la rapidez con la que se la atendiÃ³ ya que esta es la Ãºnica actividad con la que mantiene a su familia.
texts.en: Claudia works making women's clothing. She is currently making blouses and dresses. Her home is located on the eighth ring road of the city of Santa Cruz, and she leases the house under an antichretic contract. She is an excellent and enterprising worker. In the future, she wants to have a larger tailoring workship and employ workers, so that she can sell her products at a range of markets on the national level. For now, she only supplies the various markets of the city of Santa Cruz. With the funds from the loan, she will buy fabric and thread to make clothing, since she has an order to fill. Claudia appreciates the support provided to her and the speed of the service, since this is the only economic activity with which she supports her family.

loan.use: to buy fabrics and thread to make clothing.

loan.name: Rosa Alejandra

texts.es: Rosa estÃ¡ solicitando el crÃ©dito para culminar su carrera de PsicologÃ­a, ella labora como docente de primaria.. En un futuro ella quiere trabajar en una ONG u hospital ayudando a niÃ±os, jÃ³venes y adultos con problemas de conducta. le inspiran sus padres por su fortaleza y dedicaciÃ³n al apoyarla en todo momento de su vida. Cree que todos los seres humanos tienen oportunidades en la vida, y espera poder lograr su sueÃ±o de obtener su tÃ­tulo.
texts.en: Rosa is seeking a loan to finish her Psychology degree. She works as a janitor in an elementary school. In the future she would like to work for an NGO or in a hospital helping kids, teens, and adults with behavioral problems. She is inspired by her parents for having the strength and dedication to help her at every moment of her life. She believes that all human beings have opportunities in life, and she hopes to be able to realize her dream of getting her degree.

loan.use: to pay for classes she needs to graduate.

loan.name: Felicidad

texts.es: La seÃ±ora Felicidad se dedica a la compra y venta de muebles de segunda mano, para esta actividad ella cuenta con un puesto ubicado en la populosa zona de la feria de El Alto, la Paz-Bolivia. Las compras las realiza en las zonas de mÃ¡s alto nivel de vida como las de Sopocachi, zona sur de la paz. Los muebles de segunda mano son muy cotizados en la ciudad del Alto por tener en su mayorÃ­a poblaciÃ³n de muy bajos recursos. Con el dinero del crÃ©dito comprara muebles, para luego ponerlos a la venta despuÃ©s de darle una arregladita. El sueÃ±o de la seÃ±ora felicidad es el de llegar a tener su casa propia y asÃ­ ofrecer a sus 3 hijos una mejor condiciÃ³n de vida, se siente agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es la Ãºnica actividad con la que sostiene a su familia por ser su Ãºnica fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Felicidad buys and sells secondhand furniture. She has a stand for this activity located in the populous market area of El Alto, La Paz, Bolivia. She makes her purchases in the areas with the highest standard of living, such as Sopocachi and the southern area of La Paz. Secondhand furniture is very popular in the city of El Alto because the majority of its population has very few resources. With the money from the loan, she will buy furniture, which she will then sell after fixing up a bit. Felicidad's dream is to have her own house and thus offer her three children better living conditions. She is grateful for the opportunity given to her, since this is the only activity with which she sustains her family, as she is the family's only source of income.

loan.use: to purchase furniture

loan.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana estÃ¡ solicitando su crÃ©dito para pagar la finalizaciÃ³n de sus estudios de su carrera de PsicologÃ­a, actualmente trabaja como animadora de una radio estaciÃ³n. Su sueÃ±o es coronar su carrera universitaria que con esfuerzo y dedicaciÃ³n ha logrado llegar hasta el tÃ©rmino de sus materias previas al curso de titulaciÃ³n. Quiere ser PsicÃ³loga porque podrÃ¡ ayudar a las demÃ¡s personas a mejorar su conducta y calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana is requesting a loan to pay for finishing her psychology degree. Currently she works as a presenter at a radio station. Her dream is to finish her university degree with the effort and dedication she had to finish her previous degree courses. She wants to be a psychologist because she can help other people to improve their behavior and quality of life.

loan.use: pay for her university degree.

loan.name: Aracelly Del Socorro

texts.es: Aracelly es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y por siempre querer dar lo mejor de si. Desde hace aproximadamente 30 aÃ±os, Aracelly adquiriÃ³ la experiencia de la confecciÃ³n artesanal, ya que donde trabajaba le enseÃ±aron a usar las tejedoras tanto artesanales como industriales. Aracelly entonces con su conocimiento, decidiÃ³ montar su propio taller de confecciÃ³n de prendas dirigidas a los bebÃ©s, y tambiÃ©n vende el surtido de hilos y telas. Gracias a esto, Aracelly se gana los ingresos necesarios para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar, donde convive con su pareja y sus 3 hijos. Aracelly sueÃ±a con que en un futuro su negocio crezca y se consolide como un referente en su regiÃ³n, por lo que todos los dÃ­as trabaja fuertemente. Aracelly en vÃ­speras de que su negocio pueda continuar operando eficientemente, requiere de realizar el mantenimiento respectivo a 2 de sus tejedoras, y tambiÃ©n de la compra de hilos y telas para la confecciÃ³n. Sin embargo, Aracelly no cuenta con el capital suficiente, por lo que aspira a que un prÃ©stamo le permita acceder a la realizaciÃ³n de los mantenimientos a sus 2 mÃ¡quinas tejedoras y la compra de hilos y telas para seguir confeccionando sus productos. Aracelly espera que en los prÃ³ximos meses sus ventas aumenten considerablemente, pues es en esta Ã©poca donde los pedidos por sus productos aumentan considerablemente, y con los ingresos que genere quiere brindarles la mejor educaciÃ³n posible a sus 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Aracelly is a person who has been characterized as being very hard-working and as always wanting to give her best. Approximately 30 years ago, Aracelly gained experience in artisan work, since where she worked they taught her how to use artisanal as well as industrial looms. With her knowledge, Aracelly then decided to open her own workshop making clothes for babies, and she also sells thread and fabric. Thanks to this, Aracelly earns the income necessary to be able to cover the expenses of her household, where she lives with her partner and her three children.
Aracelly dreams that in the future her business will grow and consolidate into a leader in her region, for which she works hard every day. Before Aracelly's business can continue to operate efficiently, maintenance is required for two of her looms, and it is also necessary to purchase thread and fabric for production. Nevertheless, Aracelly does not have sufficient capital, so she is hoping that a loan will permit her to perform the maintenance on her two looms and to buy thread and fabric in order to continue making her products. Aracelly hopes that in the next months her sales will increase considerably, since it is at this time that orders for her products increase considerably. With the income that she earns, she wants to give her 3 children the best education possible.

loan.use: to perform maintenance on two looms in her workshop, and to buy fabric and thread

loan.name: Erica Nohemi

texts.es:
Ã‰rica NohemÃ­ de 28 aÃ±os de edad, casada desde hace 10 aÃ±os, tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 9 aÃ±os de edad quienes comienzan sus estudios, vive en Colonia flor Blanca, Petoa Santa BÃ¡rbara.
Erica, le gusta mucho la belleza, se propuso a estudiar en una academia de belleza, para cumplir su sueÃ±o de tener su propio negocio. Hace 2 aÃ±os que lo estableciÃ³ y ofrece los servicios de corte, alisado, secado, manicure, tintes e iluminaciones y tambiÃ©n vende productos como champÃº, cosmÃ©ticos, lociones, cremas etc. a este negocio ella le dedica 6 horas diarias. Lo que motivÃ³ es el deseo de sentirse Ãºtil aportando a la unidad familiar, aunque les dedique poco tiempo a sus hijos. El prÃ©stamo que solicita es para invertir en productos de belleza, cosmÃ©ticos, cremas, lociones etc. para uso en el salÃ³n y para vender a los clientes que necesitan algÃºn producto de estos. Su meta es llegar a tener un salÃ³n grande y tener mÃ¡s empleados que atiendan la demanda de clientes.
texts.en:
Ã‰rica NohemÃ­, age 28, has been married for ten years. She has two children, ages five and nine, who are starting their education. She lives in Colonia Flor Blanca, Petoa Santa BÃ¡rbara.
Erica really likes the beauty profession. She went to study at a beauty academy in order to fulfill her dream of having her own business, which she established two years ago. The services she offers are cutting, straightening, drying, manicure, dying, and highlighting. She also sells products like shampoo, cosmetics, lotions, and creams, etc. She devotes six hours a day to this business. She was motivated by the desire to feel useful contributing to the family, even though she devotes little time to her children.
The loan she is requesting is to buy beauty products, cosmetics, creams, and lotions, etc. to use in the salon and to sell to the customers who need some of these products.
Her goal is to have a big salon and to have more employees to meet her customer demand.

loan.use: to buy beauty products, cosmetics, creams, and lotions, etc.

loan.name: Gina Maria

texts.es: Gina MarÃ­a, a sus 27 aÃ±os de edad ya es madre de dos hijos de 5 y 7 aÃ±os, por los que trabaja todos los dÃ­as fuertemente con el Ã¡nimo de sacarlos adelante, y poderles brindar todo lo que necesitan. Gina MarÃ­a se caracteriza por ser una persona que siempre quiere dar lo mejor de si, y siempre quiere impactar positivamente la vida de las demÃ¡s personas. A Gina MarÃ­a sus clientes le reconocen que siempre los atiende de la mejor manera, y es por esto que siempre la buscan para comprar sus productos. Gina MarÃ­a se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 5 aÃ±os a la venta de mercancÃ­a como zapatos, jeans, tenis, entre otros productos de uso personal, y gracias a esto se genera los ingresos necesarios para poder cubrirles las necesidades bÃ¡sicas a sus 2 hijos. Gina MarÃ­a tiene un gran sueÃ±o y es el de que su negocio crezca y pueda abrir un local comercial en su municipio, de modo que esto le genere mayores ingresos y pueda mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus dos hijos. Gina MarÃ­a actualmente tiene pedidos de sus clientes que debe satisfacer, pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar la mercancÃ­a, pues los clientes nunca le pagan por adelantado. Es por esto que Gina MarÃ­a tiene el anhelo de que un prÃ©stamo le permita acceder a la compra de esta mercancÃ­a y pueda asÃ­ responder a los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes. Gina MarÃ­a aspira a que sus ventas crezcan, y en los Ãºltimos meses se ha visto como se han incrementado, es por esto que Gina MarÃ­a esta en la espera de que los ingresos extras que esta generando, le permitan ahorrar para poderles brindar a sus hijos la mejor educaciÃ³n posible.
texts.en:
Gina MarÃ­a, 27, is a mother of two kids aged 5 and 7 years old. She works for their future every day with the hope of getting her family ahead and providing for their needs. Gina MarÃ­a is known for being the type of person that always wants to give the best of herself, and she always wants to have a positive impact in other people's lives. Her clients recognize that she always assists them in the best possible way, so they continue to buy her products.
Gina MarÃ­a has 5 years of experience selling merchandise such as shoes, jeans, sneakers, and other personal use products. Thanks to her business, she has been able to earn an income to cover the basic needs of her two children. Gina MarÃ­a has a dream to grow her business and open a local business in her municipality. This will allow her to earn a higher income and improve her family's quality of life. Gina MarÃ­a has many orders from her clients, but she's been unable to buy them because she does not have the capital and her clients do not pay in advance.
Gina MarÃ­a will use the loan to buy the merchandise ordered by her clients. She hopes that her sales will increase, which she has seen in the last few months. The additional income will allow her to save money for providing her children with the best possible education.

loan.use: to buy shoes, sneakers, and jeans to fulfill orders made by her clients.

loan.name: Jhony Aurelio

texts.es: El seÃ±or Jhony se dedica a la confecciÃ³n y tejido de chompas y vestido de muÃ±ecas, el cliente ya trabajo en la instituciÃ³n en grupo comunales y demostrÃ³ puntualidad y responsabilidad, actualmente el esta casado pero por cuestiones de trabajo su esposa se encuentra de viaje en el interior, ellos tiene dos hijos que son menores de edad que se encuentran en edad escolar, la inversiÃ³n del crÃ©dito serÃ¡ en la compra de lana para el tejido y la compra de muÃ±ecas artesanales, las muÃ±ecas artesanales son parecidas a las mujeres del occidente de esta regiÃ³n, realiza un buen trabajo de calidad por esto tiene muchos pedidos en las tiendas artesanales, El sr. jhony es una persona emprendedora con ganas de superaciÃ³n con deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Jhony works making and knitting sweaters and dresses for dolls. He already worked with the institution, in communal banks, and showed punctuality and responsibility. Currently he is married but for work reasons his wife is traveling in the interior. They have two minor children who are of school age.
The investment of the loan will be to buy wool for the knitting and to buy traditional dolls, which resemble the women of the western part of this region. He does good-quality work and so he has many orders from the handmade craft stores.
Jhony is an enterprising person who wants to improve himself and his quality of life and that of his family.

loan.use: to buy wool and dolls.

loan.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: Maria Mercedes es una pequeÃ±a comerciante, se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, el crÃ©dito lo estÃ¡ solicitando para pagar el curso de titulaciÃ³n de su carrera de PsicologÃ­a. Sus planes son formarse como una de las mejores profesionales, trabajando en un hospital. Sus planes son en un futuro estudiar un postgrado o maestrÃ­a. Le inspira el poder ayudar a otros, crecer como persona. Uno de los desafÃ­os ha sido poder mantener su carrera, ya que la situaciÃ³n del negocio ha sido buena y mala.
texts.en: Maria Mercedes is a small merchant selling beauty products. The loan will be used to pay for her graduation as a Bachelor in Psychology. She plans to become one of the best career women working in a hospital. In the future, she also plans to study for a post doctoral or Master's program. She's inspired by the power to help others and personal growth. One of the challenges she has faced is to maintain her career, since the job environment has been good and bad.

loan.use: to finish her studies and pay for her graduation.

loan.name: MarÃ­a Donila

texts.es:
La seÃ±ora MarÃ­a tiene 27 aÃ±os de edad, vive con su compaÃ±ero de vida y dos hijos.
Desde hace tres aÃ±os MarÃ­a trabaja como empleada en una unidad de salud de una comunidad, antes ella se dedicaba a estudiar pero debido a la necesidad en su familia, decidiÃ³ trabajar. Su familia es muy unida, honesta, responsable con una buena reputaciÃ³n en la comunidad.
MarÃ­a solicita el prÃ©stamo a FundaciÃ³n Campo, para la compra de 25 bloques de cemento, hierro, cemento, piedra y para el pago de mano de obra, para mejorar su vivienda y que este mÃ¡s segura para su familia y mejorarles la calidad de vida.
Ella desea continuar estudiando el bachillerato, para superarse cada dÃ­a mÃ¡s y seguir trabajando con la FundaciÃ³n Campo para mejorar su futuro.
texts.en:
MarÃ­a, 27, lives with her partner and their two children. MarÃ­a has been working as an employee in a community health center. She used to study, but decided to work to meet her family's needs. Her family is very tight-knit, honest, responsible, and with a good reputation within the community.
MarÃ­a will use the loan from FundaciÃ³n Campo to buy 25 concrete blocks, iron, cement, stone and to pay for manual labor that will improve her house. These improvements will provide added security to her family and make their quality of life better. She wishes to continue studying for her bachelor's degree, to excel each day and continue working with FundaciÃ³n Campo for a better future.

loan.use: to buy 25 concrete blocks, iron, cement, stone and to pay for manual labor that will improve her house.

loan.name: Las Esmeraldas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Amelia, tiene 3 hijos es conviviente y lleva trabajando con Edaprospo desde hace 1 aÃ±o, Amelia es tesorera del grupo â€œLas Esmeraldasâ€, grupo conformado por 11 socios que se dedicana diversas actividades de comercio. Amelia trabaja vendiendo productos de belleza desde hace 10 aÃ±os y a su vez tambiÃ©n vende gaseosa, cerveza y los domingos comida, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicaciÃ³n a logrado mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos, brindÃ¡ndoles educaciÃ³n y con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo prÃ©stamo para comprar mercaderÃ­a y asÃ­ poder emempezar a vender ropa. Sabemos que, Amelia cumplirÃ¡ sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prÃ©stamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Amelia has three children, and she is in a common-law marriage. She has been working with Edaprospo for one year. Amelia is the treasurer of the â€œLas Esmeraldasâ€ communal bank. The group is comprised of 11 members who devote themselves to different business activities.
Amelia has worked selling beauty products for one year. She also sells soft drinks, beer, and on Sundays she sells food. Thanks to her effort and dedication she has managed to improve the quality of life for her children by giving them an education.
In order to continue growing she has requested a new loan to buy merchandise so that she can start selling clothes. We know that Amelia will accomplish her goals with a lot of work and effort. We also know the loans from Edaprospro will help her.

loan.use: to buy clothes.

loan.name: Celestina Gladis

texts.es: La Sra. Celestina se dedica a la elaboraciÃ³n de masitas como ser suspiros, canelones grandes pequeÃ±os, alfajores de maicena entre otros ahora debido a la proximidad de la feria de la alasita la Sra. Necesita incrementar su capital para elaborar masitas en mayor cantidad para surtir a todas las vendedoras de la feria de la alasita por este motivo solicito su crÃ©dito para la compra de insumos como harina y azÃºcar, en otras temporadas la Sra. TambiÃ©n se dedica a la venta de mercaderÃ­a que trae desde la localidad de Desaguadero, El domicilio es de su propiedad y esta ubicado en la zona los Andes y el horno se encuentra en el mismo domicilio, Su familia esta compuesta de dos hijos y su esposo el cual le ayuda a la distribuciÃ³n de sus productos.
texts.en: Celestina has a business making pastries, such as meringue cookies, small and large cannelloni, sandwich cookies, and other items. Since the Alasitas Fair is approaching, she needs to increase her capital so that she can make meringue cookies in greater quantity to supply to the sellers at the fair. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as flour and sugar. During other times of the year, Celestina also sells merchandise that she brings to her town from Desaguadero. She owns her own home, which is located in the Andes neighborhood, and her oven is located in this home. Her family includes her two children and her husband, who helps her distribute her products.

loan.use: to buy supplies to make bakery products for the Alasitas Fair

loan.name: Lidia Martha

texts.es: Dentro de 5 o 10 aÃ±os Lidia se ve trabajando y desarrollandose en el campo de la PsicologÃ­a, por eso solicita el prÃ©stamo, para pagar el curso de titulaciÃ³n para finalizar su carerra. Su deseo de superaciÃ³n y su inspiraciÃ³n principal son sus hijos, y tener una estabilidad econÃ³mica familiar. Espera ayudar a otras personas y en un futuro tener una clÃ­nica donde pueda desarrollar su carrera.
texts.en: Within 5 to 10 years, Lidia sees herself working and developing in the field of psychology. This is why she is applying for the loan -- to pay for her degree course to finish her coursework. Her desire is to excel and to have stable family finances; her principal inspiration is her children. She hopes to help other people and in the future to have a clinic where she can develop her career.

loan.use: to pay for her degree course.

loan.name: Carlos Eduardo

texts.es:
Carlos Eduardo tiene 25 aÃ±os de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con la mamÃ¡ en Ventanas Provincia de los RÃ­os.
Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul.
Carlos Eduardo se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z, ademÃ¡s tiene animales como pollos Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrÃ­colas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crÃ©dito para invertir en la agricultura para sembrar maÃ­z y comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, lÃ­quido para plagas, insumos. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito mejorarÃ¡ y aumentarÃ¡ los sembrÃ­os.
Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas de langosta. El sueÃ±o es tener tierra propia para trabajar.
En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar el indor y escuchar mÃºsica.
texts.en:
Carlos Eduardo is 25 years old. He is single and has no children. He lives with his mother in the Ventanas Province of Los Rios.
He is a member of the Nuevo Horizonte (New Horizon) communal bank, which is located in the Cachely Grande precinct, which belongs to the Ventanas canton. This communal bank is dedicated to short-term agriculture (harvest within 6 months of planting), such as planting corn, rice, and pigeon peas.
Carlos Eduardo works in agriculture. He plants corn, and in addition he has animals such as chickens. He makes his purchases and sells his agricultural products in Ventanas.
He is applying for the loan to invest in his agricultural work, to plant corn and to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, liquids for pests, and other items. With the help of the loan, he will improve and increase his plantings.
He faces challenges such as plagues of locusts. His dream is to have his own land to work.
In his free time he likes to play indoor sports and listen to music.

loan.use: to plant corn and to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, liquids for pests, and other items

loan.name: Natividad

texts.es: Natividad, de 39 aÃ±os, es una mujer buena y amable, esta casada y tiene dos hijos quienes son su razÃ³n de esfuerzo y trabajo, ellos son Nora de 16 y Tedy de 6 aÃ±os. Juntos habitan en su casa propia a lado de su esposo Eduardo de 50 aÃ±os, ella lo que mas desea es poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y es por eso que trabaja mucho para poder lograrlo. El trabajo de Natividad consiste en la venta de comida y golosinas, a diario durante las noches sale a la vereda de su casa en espera de sus clientes para satisfacer sus necesidades, mientras que por la maÃ±ana se va a la puerta de un colegio de la ciudad en donde ofrece y vende golosinas a los escolares. Lleva realizando este trabajo por mas de 28 aÃ±os, heredÃ³ todo de las enseÃ±anzas de su madre quien le dio las lecciones sobre como cocinar y como realizar buenas ventas. Le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que le permite tener tiempo para que pueda brindar a su familia, ademÃ¡s de tener buenos ingresos y asÃ­ aportar a la economÃ­a del hogar. Espera poder seguir trabajando para asÃ­ poder progresar y salir adelante con su familia, tiene muchos planes pero por el momento espera la expansiÃ³n de su negocio. Este serÃ¡ el crÃ©dito nÃºmero 16 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboraciÃ³n para continuar con sus objetivos, por su parte se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual como en anteriores crÃ©ditos que tuvo, ademÃ¡s se siente muy a gusto de poder trabajar con su banco comunal ya que son buenos y muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprarÃ¡ ingredientes y vÃ­veres no perecibles, ademÃ¡s de implementar su pequeÃ±o puesto de golosinas para asÃ­ ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: Natividad, 39, is a good and kind woman. She is married and has 2 children, who are the motivation for her efforts and hard work. They are: Nora, who is 16, and Tedy, who is 6. They all live together in the house she owns with her husband Eduardo, who is 50. What Natividad wants the most is to be able to provide a better quality of life for her family, and so she works very hard to achieve this. Natividad works selling food and candy. Every evening, she goes out to the sidewalk in front of her house and awaits her customers, so that she can meet their needs. In the mornings, she goes to the entrance of a school in her city to offer candy for sale to the students. She has been doing this work for more than 28 years. Her mother passed down knowledge to her about how to cook and make good sales. Natividad likes her work very much, because it allows her to have time for her family and have a good income so that she can contribute to the finances of the household. She hopes to continue to work so that she can make progress and get ahead with her family. She has a lot of plans, but at this moment she is working on expanding her business. This will be her 16th loan with MFP, and so she awaits your support so that she can continue to pursue her goals. On her part, she promises to make her payments on time, as she has done with the previous loans that she took. In addition, she feels very comfortable working with her communal bank, since the members are good and responsible people. With the sum of 2,000 Peruvian soles that she requests, she will buy ingredients, non-perishable food items, and candy for her sales post so that she can offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

loan.use: to buy non-perishables and candy

loan.name: Beatriz Adelina

texts.es:
Beatriz Adelina tiene 40 aÃ±os de edad es casada tiene tres hijos, vive con el esposo y los hijos de 14, 7 y 4 aÃ±os de edad en Ventanas Provincia de los RÃ­os.
Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul. Beatriz Adelina se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z. Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrÃ­colas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crÃ©dito para comprar insumos, abonos, fertilizantes, lÃ­quido para plagas. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito podrÃ¡ seguir trabajando en la agricultura y tener mejor estado financiero.
Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas cÃ³mo la langosta, horosco y la cinta roja. El sueÃ±o es comprarse terrenos y seguir trabajando. En el tiempo libre le gusta enseÃ±ar a los niÃ±os las tareas para la escuela y el colegio.
texts.en:
Beatriz Adelina is 40 years old, and she is married with three children. She lives with her husband and her children aged 14, 7 and 4, in Ventanas, province of Los RÃ­os.
She is a member of VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, located in Cachely Grande which belongs to Ventanas Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.
Beatriz Adelina makes a living growing corn. She both buys and sells her agricultural products in Ventanas.
She is requesting a loan to buy supplies, manure, fertilizers and pesticides. With the support of the loan she will be able to continue farming and have a better financial situation.
She faces challenges like pest infestations like locust, "horosco" and "cinta roja" (red stripe). Her dream is to buy land and continue working.
In her free time she likes to teach her children their school assignments and homework.

loan.use: to buy supplies, manure, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loan.name: Triunfadores De Los RÃ­os Group

texts.es: Este Banco comunal se llama â€œTriunfadores de los RÃ­osâ€, estÃ¡ conformado por 16 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran confecciÃ³n de vestidos de gala, venta de perfumes, venta de calzado, ropa, joyas y manteles, ademÃ¡s de la preparaciÃ³n de mermeladas y galletas, y finalmente quienes se desempeÃ±an en radio y negocio. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valdivia. Margarita integrante del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en la segunda fila de piÃ©, ocupando el tercer lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste una chaqueta color beige, una polera color negro debajo y usa su cabello tomado. Ella se dedica al rubro de la prestaciÃ³n de servicios, especÃ­ficamente desempeÃ±Ã¡ndose en masoterapia (Terapia alternativa), desde hace 1 aÃ±o. Ofrece masajes descontracturantes, de relajaciÃ³n y reductivos. Comenta que presta sus servicios a domicilio, por lo que su horario de trabajo es flexible. AdemÃ¡s en su casa tambiÃ©n realiza los masajes en un dormitorio que habilitÃ³ para su negocio. Los insumos que necesita son aceites naturales, los cuales los envÃ­a a preparar por litro, los cuales le sirven para un mes. Con el crÃ©dito comprarÃ¡ ventosas (artÃ­culos de masajes para descontracturar). Sus metas son contar con un local establecido, de manera independiente, ademÃ¡s impartir cursos de masajes, para esto comenta que necesita de alguna instituciÃ³n que le brinde algÃºn sello de garantÃ­a para tener un mayor prestigio a sus clases y posteriores diplomas. Margarita vive junto a su marido y uno de sus sueÃ±os son realizarse profesionalmente, para esto quiere especializarse en la terapia bio magnÃ©tica (masajes con imanes). Ella estÃ¡ muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirÃ¡ invertir en su negocio. AdemÃ¡s disfruta de las reuniones y capacitaciones impartidas junto al grupo. Valdivia es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la regiÃ³n de Los RÃ­os. Se destaca por tener uno de los pocos rÃ­os navegables de Chile, el Calle Calle. Valdivia presenta, dentro de sus principales actividades econÃ³micas, la industria de la construcciÃ³n naval, maderera, papelera, celulosa (Celco), cervecera y molinera. El turismo desempeÃ±a un papel importante, como tambiÃ©n los servicios educacionales universitarios, encabezados por la Universidad Austral de Chile.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Triunfadores de los RÃ­os. It is made up of 16 entrepreneurs who are working in different fields among which are making party dresses, selling perfumes, shoe sales, jewelry and tablecloths, as well as preparing jams and cookies, and finally they are working in radio and business. All of them are residents of Valdivia.
Margareta is a member of the the communal bank who in the photo can be found in the second row, standing up, the third place from left to right, dressed in a beige color jacket with a black t-shirt underneath it, and her hair pulled back.
She has been working in the field of offering services, specifically massage therapy (alternative therapy) for one year. She offers muscle massages, relaxation, and reduction.
She comments that she offers her services at home so her work schedule is flexible. Also, in her home she has made a massage room that she is using for this business.
The supplies that she needs are natural oils, which she gets by the liter, so it lasts for a month. With the money from the loan she will buy suction cups (articles used for massages).
Her goals are to have an established facility, independently, to teach massage classes and for this she says that she needs an institution that gives a seal of approval in order for her classes to be more prestigious and offer diplomas.
Margarita lives with her husband and one of her dreams is to progress professionally. To do this she wants to specialize in bio magnetic therapy (message with magnets.)
She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity given through Fondo Esperanza, allowing her to invest in her business. She always enjoys the meetings and the training given to the group.
Valdivia is a city in the south of Chile located in the Los RÃ­os region. It is notable for having one of the few navigable rivers in Chile, the Calle Calle. Valdivia has, within its primary economic activity, the shipbuilding industry, timber, paper, cellulose (Celco), brewing and milling. Tourism plays an important role, as well as university educational services, led by the Universidad Austral de Chile.

loan.use: to buy suction cups for massage purposes

loan.name: Karem Del Socorro

texts.es: Karem es una joven emprendedora, estÃ¡ estudiando PsicologÃ­a, el prÃ©stamo serÃ¡ usado para pagar el curso de titulaciÃ³n de finalizaciÃ³n de sus estudios, sus padres le apoyaran en al pago del crÃ©dito. Dentro de algunos aÃ±os se ve en su propia clÃ­nica, siendo capaz de ganar su propio salario, Su inspiraciÃ³n es su hijo porque es lo que mÃ¡s quiere en su vida, y es su motor. Ha sido formada en una familia honrada y mi familia tiene un rÃ©cord crediticio excelente. Su embarazo fue un desafÃ­o ya que lo viviÃ³ estando en la universidad, pero su familia le ayudÃ³ a superarlo tanto en lo econÃ³mico como emocional
texts.en: Karem is an enterprising young woman. Sheâ€™s studying Psychology. The loan will be used to pay for the final coursework in her studies. Her parents will help her repay the loan. In a few years she sees herself in her own clinic able to earn her own salary. Her inspiration is her son because she loves him above all else in life and heâ€™s her motivating factor. Sheâ€™s grown up in an honest family and her family has excellent credit history. Her pregnancy was a challenge since she underwent it while attending university but her family helped her overcome it both emotionally and economically.

loan.use: to pay graduation costs.

loan.name: Motivadas Por Un SueÃ±o 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Delia is the coordinator of her group "Motivadas por un SueÃ±o". Her group is located in the rural area surrounding El Seybo, an agricultural area. Before Esperanza came to her community, Delia started her business with a first loan that she took from someone in her community. A month later, Esperanza gave her a loan with which she expanded her business. This group is composed of 15 members running different businesses like shoes, clothing, cosmetics, and many other small businesses.
Delia plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing jeans, blouses, t-shirts, shoes and cosmetics. She operates a miscellaneous sales business, selling products like these and many others, such as jewels, underwear, etc. She has had her business for almost two years. She is excited to be taking out her third loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. She will save her profits to reinvest in her business.
She makes her home here in a simple house with her long-time partner and their three children. She says that her most difficult challenge is to raise her children and to give them all they need. She is dreaming of having her own house and of having a successful business.
Two pictures were taken, one with 10 and another with five, to complete a whole picture with the 15 entrepreneurs.

loan.use: to buy jeans, blouses, t-shirts, shoes and cosmetics

loan.name: Victor Hugo

texts.es: El sr. VÃ­ctor, es un cliente nuevo que vino a la instituciÃ³n por la invitaciÃ³n de su hermana, Gregoria, el Sr. VÃ­ctor vive en la zona Alto Chijini, de la ciudad de La Paz, el se dedica a la confecciÃ³n de chamarras vive con su esposa y un hijo, el crÃ©dito es para la compra de una maquina over looc de cinco hilos para la confecciÃ³n de sus prendas de vestir, le esta yendo muy bien en esta actividad por el buen trabajo que realiza, entrega a los distintos mercados de la ciudad de La Paz, y su deseo es poder llevar sus productos a distintos departamentos como Oruro y PotosÃ­ ya que las chamarras por el clima frio tienen gran demanda en esas ciudades, se siente muy feliz el Sr. VÃ­ctor por la oportunidad que le brindan, es una persona emprendedora con ganas de superaciÃ³n.
texts.en: VÃ­ctor is a new client who came to the institution invited by his sister, Gregoria. VÃ­ctor lives in the city of La Pazâ€™s Alto Chijini zone. He makes jackets. He lives with his wife and a son. The loan is to buy a five thread overlock sewing machine to make the articles of clothing. Heâ€™s doing very well in this activity thanks to the good work he does. He sells to various markets in the city of La Paz and his wish is to take his products to various other departments like Oruro and PotosÃ­ because cold weather jackets are in high demand in these cities. VÃ­ctor feels very happy because of the opportunity heâ€™s being given; heâ€™s an enterprising person who very much wants to improve.

loan.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 57 aÃ±os, es una mujer amable y muy trabajadora, esta separada del que fue su esposo y con quien tuvo tres hijos a quienes criÃ³ y educÃ³. Ahora son mayores e independices, ella vive en su casa propia en donde comparte junto a su hijo ademÃ¡s de su nieto, quien es la alegrÃ­a de su hogar. La actividad a la que se dedica Reyna es al del alquiler de cuartos y locales comerciales en el amplio terreno que tiene en su casa. Desde hace 10 aÃ±os que se dio cuenta que como su terreno colinda con una calle muy concurrida y comercial y vio en ella una fuente de ingresos muy rentable asÃ­ que decidiÃ³ realizar la construcciÃ³n de sus cuartos y locales y ponerlos en alquiler. EmpezÃ³ con 2 y ahora los amplio a 6, los que le permiten tener buenos ingresos fijos al mes. Le esta yendo muy bien ya que a medida que crece el comercio en esa zona, tambiÃ©n crece el costo de alquiler. Espera que le siga yendo bien y desea ampliar un par de locales mas y asÃ­ incrementar sus ingresos. Este serÃ¡ el crÃ©dito nÃºmero 5 con MFP, estÃ¡ muy contenta de saber que recibirÃ¡ el apoyo financiero para poder continuar con su trabajo y asÃ­ mejorar su capital, ademÃ¡s se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en otros crÃ©dito que tuvo, por otro lado menciona que se siente muy cÃ³moda en su banco comunal ya que sus compaÃ±eros son responsables y muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado comprarÃ¡ materiales para poder refaccionar algunas paredes y los pisos de sus locales.
texts.en:
Reyna, 57, is a kind, very hardworking woman. Sheâ€™s separated from her husband with whom she had three children that she raised and educated. Now, they are independent adults. She lives in her own house that she shares with one of her sons as well as her grandson who is her homeâ€™s joy.
Reyna works leasing out rooms and commercial sites on the large piece of property her house is located on. Over ten years ago she noticed that her property is situated on a very busy commercial street and saw the possibility of a profitable source of income so she decided to build rooms and commercial units and to rent them out. She started with two and now has expanded to six which produce steady monthly income. Sheâ€™s doing very well because as commerce grows in the area housing costs rise accordingly. She hopes to continue to do well and wants to expand with a couple of more sites to thus increase her income.
This will be MFP loan #5. Sheâ€™s very happy to know that she will have financial support to be able to continue in business and improve her capital. She once again commits to make her installment payments like she did with her previous loan. She mentions that she feels very comfortable in her communal bank because her fellow members are responsible and very supportive. She will use the requested amount to buy building materials and supplies to redo some of the walls and floors in her units.

loan.use: to buy cement and sand.

loan.name: Nidia Marleny

texts.es:
La seÃ±ora Nidia tiene 40 aÃ±os de edad, esta separa de su esposo y tiene un hijo.
A los 18 aÃ±os de edad Nidia se caso, pero cuando tenia dos aÃ±os de casada su esposo la abandono quedando sola con un niÃ±o, entonces ella pensÃ³ en que podÃ­a hacer para sobrevivir con su hijo, a los 20 aÃ±os a Nidia se le ocurriÃ³ instalar una granja de pollos y gallinas con mucho esfuerzo lo logro, vio que le era muy rentable obtenÃ­a muy buenas ganancias y asÃ­ fue que saco a su hijo adelante.
Cuando tenÃ­a 30 aÃ±os de edad Nidia, tomo la decisiÃ³n de casarse nuevamente, pero hace dos aÃ±os se separo de su esposo, aunque no estÃ¡n divorciados. Desde hace dos aÃ±os ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdas parideras, y este negocio le esta siendo rentable, con lo que esta ahorrando ella planea repellar su casa, ponerle ladrillo al piso, para convertirla en una vivienda digna para su hijo.
Para comprar los insumos de la semana para la crianza de sus cerdas, Nidia se traslada una vez a la semana a una ciudad del oriente del paÃ­s, para llegar ahÃ­ ella camina a pie durante treinta minutos, desde su casa hasta donde aborda el autobÃºs que tarda una hora en ir y venir. Cuando llega al desviÃ³ Nidia paga una mototaxi para trasladar los insumos hasta su casa, ya que el autobÃºs no la deja en su casa. Por falta de dinero ella no compra mÃ¡s insumos para no viajar tanto a la ciudad.
Nidia esta solicitando el prÃ©stamo a FundaciÃ³n Campo, para comprar dos cerdas engrilladas cada una cuesta $350, y el resto lo utilizara para comprar concentrado lechero para alimentarlas. Con esta compra ella espera obtener ganancias de sus crÃ­as y asÃ­ reparara su casa para vivir en un lugar mas digno el resto de sus dÃ­as, que es lo que siempre ha soÃ±ado y no lo ha podido realizar porque lo primero que pensaba era en brindarle la educaciÃ³n a su hijo.
texts.en:
Nidia, 40, is separated from her husband and has a son. Nidia got married at the age of 18 but when sheâ€™d been married for two years her husband left her alone with a child. She had to think what she could do to survive with her son. At the age of 20 it occurred to her to set up a chicken ranch and with much effort accomplished it. She saw that it was very profitable and this is how she supported her son.
When she was 30, Nidia decided to remarry but two years ago separated from her husband although they arenâ€™t divorced. For the last two years sheâ€™s raised breeding sows and this business is profitable. She plans to use what sheâ€™s saving up to plaster her house, install brick flooring and turn it into a proper home for her son.
To buy the weekly supplies she needs to raise her pigs, Nidia travels once a week to a city in the east of the country. To get there she must first walk 30 minutes from her house to catch the bus which takes an hour to go each way. When she arrives at the fork in the road, Nidia pays a mototaxi to transport her supplies to her house because the bus doesnâ€™t bring her all the way home. For lack of money she does not buy more supplies in order not to have to travel to the city so often.
Nidia is asking FundaciÃ³n Campo fore this loan to buy two pregnant sows which cost $350 each and will use the rest to buy milk concentrate to feed them. With this purchase she hopes to earn profits from the litters to repair her house and live in a more proper place for the rest of her life which is what sheâ€™s always dreamed about but has been unable to do so because the first thing she thought about was providing an education for her son.

loan.use: to buy two sows and feed for them.

loan.name: Ana Rosa

Es integrante de la VRC DIVINO NIÃ‘O, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz.

Solicita el crÃ©dito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito mejorarÃ¡ el trabajo, Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas. El sueÃ±o es comprarse una casa.
En el tiempo libre le gusta arreglar la casa.

loan.name: Maria Norely

texts.es: Maria Norely se ha caracterizado por ser una muy buena madre de sus 2 hijos de 3 y 11 aÃ±os, ademÃ¡s que tambiÃ©n se ha caracterizado por ser una muy buena esposa. Maria Norely la reconocen sus familiares y los habitantes de su sector por ser una persona muy noble y muy dedicada a intentar impactar positivamente en la vida de los demÃ¡s, por lo que siempre que tiene la posibilidad ayuda a las personas que mÃ¡s lo necesitan y desde su negocio quiere seguir haciendo lo mismo. Maria Norely abriÃ³ su tienda hace ya un tiempo, en ella vende productos de la canasta familiar y demÃ¡s productos que requieren sus clientes, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de su familia. Maria Norely quiere que sus ingresos aumenten para poder ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, empezando por que sus hijos puedan acceder a una mejor educaciÃ³n de la que acceden ahora. Es por esto que Maria Norely esta en la bÃºsqueda de comprar una moto que le facilite hacer servicios a domicilios, y de esta manera sus ventas se incrementen notablemente. Sin embargo, Maria Norely no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder acceder a la compra de la moto, por lo que aspira a que un prÃ©stamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a este vehÃ­culo de transporte y pueda ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Maria Norely aspira que con el servicio a domicilio sus ventas se incrementaran, y de esta manera podrÃ¡ cumplir su sueÃ±o de que sus dos hijos puedan ingresar a una instituciÃ³n donde le brinden una mejor educaciÃ³n a la que tienen actualmente.
texts.en:
MarÃ­a Norely has been notable for being a very good mother of her two children who are 3 and 11 years old; sheâ€™s also been characterized as being a very good wife. MarÃ­a Norely is known by relatives and residents of her sector for being a very noble, dedicated person who tries to make a positive impact in the lives of others so is always willing to help those who need it most and would like to continue to do so from her business.
MarÃ­a Norely opened her store some time ago; she sells basic staple items as well as other products her customers need. Thanks to this she generates income needed to support her family. MarÃ­a Norely wants her income to increase to offer her family a better quality of life starting with her children being able to access better schooling than they currently receive. Because of this MarÃ­a Norely is looking to buy a motorcycle that will facilitate doing home deliveries which will lead to notably increased sales.
However, MarÃ­a Norely does not have sufficient capital to be able to buy the motorcycle which is why she hopes for a loan that will make access to this vehicle and better customer service possible. MarÃ­a Norely hopes that home deliveries will lead to increased sales which will in turn help her reach her dream of her children being able to enroll in an institution where they can get a better education that what they are getting now.

loan.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loan.name: Erica Jharly

Erica Jharly tiene 18 aÃ±os de edad de estado civil actual uniÃ³n libre tiene un hijo, vive con el compaÃ±ero y el hijo de 2 aÃ±os de edad en Ventanas provincia de los rÃ­os.
Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul.
Erica Jharly se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z, frÃ©jol. Las compras y las ventas de los productos lo hace en ventanas.

texts.en:

Erica Jharly is a corn and pigeon pea farmer. Her purchases and sales of products take place in Ventanas.
Sheâ€™s asking for the loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, liquids for the infestations and supplies. With support from the loan sheâ€™ll be able to plant corn. The challenges she faces are crop insect infestations.
Her dream is to improve her economic situation for her sonâ€™s wellbeing. In her free time she likes to spend time with her family.

loan.name: Reynaldo Andres

texts.es: El seÃ±or Reynaldo, es humilde agricultor de zona de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa, los planes hacia su familia es poder mejorar su situaciÃ³n del hogar, don Reynaldo desde hace varios aÃ±os se dedica a la siembra de piÃ±a, la mayor dificultad que se le presento fue el fallecimiento de uno de sus hijos lo cual provoco inestabilidad ya que para ellos la muerte fue muy impactante debido a la intensidad de un accidente en moto ; su esposa todavÃ­a esta en tratamiento con el psicÃ³logo y esta situaciÃ³n hace que don Reynaldo divida su tiempo ya que ahora Ã©l esta en el negocio de destace de cerdo y en la agricultura .Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atravez de los fondos Kiva ,ya que sin ellos no hubiese sacado su producciÃ³n a flote . El cultivo carece de fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para poder combatir plagas como es la mosca blanca ya que si no induce en tiempo y forma no podrÃ¡ restablecerse el cultivo de piÃ±a , pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la inversiÃ³n .
texts.en:
Reynaldo is a humble farmer in Ticuantepe alongside his wife. His plan for his family is to be able to improve the situation of the home. Reynaldo has been farming pineapple for several years and the greatest difficulty heâ€™s faced was the death of one of his children which created instability since it was a very impacting death for them because of the intensity of a motorcycle accident. His wife is still under the care of a psychologist and this situation makes Reynaldo divide his time between the pineapple farming and pig butchering.
He is very grateful for the support Afodenic provides him through Kiva funds because without them he would not have been able to stay afloat.
The crops need fertilizer and other necessary supplies to combat infestations like white fly that if not treated in a timely fashion will not allow the pineapple crop to recover but he does not have sufficient capital to make the investment.

loan.use: to buy farm supplies.

loan.name: Cristina Marilyn

texts.es:
Cristina Marilyn tiene 29 aÃ±os de estado civil uniÃ³n libre tiene un hijo de dos aÃ±os, vive con el compaÃ±ero y el hijo en Ventans provincia de los RÃ­os.
Es integrante de la VRC NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al CantÃ³n Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores AgrÃ­colas de ciclo corto siembra de maÃ­z, arroz, frejol gandul. Cristina Marilyn se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maÃ­z, ademÃ¡s tiene gallinas. Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrÃ­colas lo hace en ventanas.
Solicita el crÃ©dito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, lÃ­quido para plagas, insumos. Con el apoyo del crÃ©dito podrÃ¡ incrementar el cultivo. Enfrenta desafÃ­os como las plagas en los cultivos.

texts.en:
Cristina Marilyn, age 29, is in a common-law marriage and has a two year old child. She lives with her life partner and her son in Ventanas in the RÃ­os province.
She is a member of the â€œNuevo Horizonteâ€ (New Horizon) communal bank. The bank is in the Cachely Grande precinct in the Ventanas canton. This communal bank devotes itself to growing short cycle corn, rice, and pigeon pea beans.
Cristina Marilyn grows corn, and she also has chickens. She buys and sells farming products in Ventantas.
She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, and supplies. With the support of the loan she will be able to increase her crops. She faces challenges like pests in the crops.
Her dream is to buy land and to improve the family income. She likes to spend her free time with her family.

loan.name: Segundo

texts.es: Segundo, de 60 aÃ±os es un hombre que dio mucho por su familia en la vida, siempre se mostrÃ³ como un hombre trabajador, empeÃ±ozo y muy dedicado. Es asÃ­ que de los cuatro hijos que tiene ya todos son mayores e independientes, y Ã©l vive a lado de su esposa en su casa propia que pudo comprar con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio y en donde siempre compartiÃ³ momentos felices con sus hijos. Ahora trabaja mucho para asÃ­ poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y tener una vejez tranquila. El trabajo de Segundo consiste en el arreglo y mantenimiento de aire acondicionado, por lo general trabaja con algunas instituciones publicas y privadas, pero en los momentos en no se encuentra trabajando estÃ¡ en su casa arreglando algunas cosas. Siempre esta a la expectativa de sus telÃ©fono fijo o Mobil ya que cuando suena es por que un cliente necesita que vaya a su casa u oficina a reparar su sistema de aire. Lleva trabajando con este negocio desde hace 31 aÃ±os en los cuales ganÃ³ experiencia y mejorÃ³ su tÃ©cnica. Le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que le permite tener su tiempo para dedicar a su hogar, ademÃ¡s de darle buenas ganancias ya que en esta parte el calor es intenso y hay muchas instalaciones de aire acondicionado, lo que significa para Ã©l un mercado muy amplio. Ahora esta en etapa de hacer crecer su negocio pues no solo quiere arreglar sino que tambiÃ©n vender repuestos para estos productos. Este serÃ¡ el sexto crÃ©dito con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrÃ¡ un apoyo financieros y asÃ­ aumentar su capital de trabajo, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cutas, como en anteriores crÃ©ditos que tuvo, estÃ¡ muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprarÃ¡ materiales y herramientas para poder hacer mejor su trabajo, ademÃ¡s de algunas piezas y repuestos necesarios para comenzar a vender.
texts.en: Sixty-year-old Segundo is a man who has given a lot for his family. He always proved to be a hardworking, determined, and very dedicated man. That's why his four grown children are all independent. He lives with his wife in their own home, which he was able to buy thanks to a lot of hard work and sacrifice and which has always been the place where he shared happy moments with his children. Now he is working hard to be able to offer his wife a better quality of life and to have a quiet retirement. Segundo's work is repairing and maintaining air conditioners. He generally works with a few public and private institutions, but when he's not working he's usually at home fixing things. He's always waiting for his cell or home phone to ring because when it does it's because a customer needs him to go to his house or office to repair an air system. He has been in this business for 31 years, during which he has gained experience and improved his technique. He likes his work a lot because it allows him to have free time to spend at home and it also makes him good money because in his area the heat is intense and there are a lot of air conditioning systems, which mean a big market for him. He is currently at the stage where he is expanding his business, as he wants to not only do repairs, but also to sell replacement parts for these products. This will be his sixth loan with MFP and he is very happy to know that he will have the financial support to increase his working capital. He also promises once again to make his payments on time, as he has with his previous loans. He is very happy to belong to his communal bank as all the members are responsible and supportive. With the 1,000 nuevos soles he has requested, he will buy materials and tools to better perform his job and he will also buy some of the parts he needs to start selling.

loan.use: to buy tools and parts

loan.name: Albalina Del Carmen

texts.es: La seÃ±ora Albalina, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su familia , los planes hacia su familia es poder terminar de construir su vivienda , esta muy feliz por el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic Atraves de los fondo Kiva ; ya que con el primer prÃ©stamo logro cerrar la pared de tablitas que tenia , ahora ella necesita financiamiento para poder embaldosar su casita ya que en la actualidad es de tierra y no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder realizar la comprar , debido a que ella labora como empleada domestica en una casa privada y su esposo es comerciante de pollo y solo ajustan para cubrir apenas algunas necesidades del hogar .
texts.en: SeÃ±ora Albalina, together with her family, is a resident of the municipality of Ticuantepe. Her plans for her family are to finish construction on their home. SeÃ±ora Albalina is very happy about the help being offered by Afodenic through Kiva. With her first loan, she was able to close off the plank wall she had. Now she needs financing to be able to tile her little house. Currently, the house is earthen and she doesn't have enough money to purchase the tile. SeÃ±ora Albalina works as a domestic servant in a private home and her husband sells chickens, and so they only make enough to barely cover their household expenses.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials.

loan.name: Luisa

texts.es: La seÃ±ora Luisa vive en la zona de Alto San Antonio que esta ubicado a veinte minutos del centro de la cuidad, ella esta casada con el Sr. Constantino y tienen tres hijos de los cuales uno ya es mayor de edad y los menores se encuentran en edad escolar, la Sra. Luisa es muy trabajadora y se dedica a la venta de cerveza por mayor, ella llega a vender hasta 500 cajas en fiestas grandes como ser las fiestas de carnavales y gran poder. Su esposo esta trabajando como minero en una empresa minera de la ciudad de PotosÃ­, ella trabaja con prestamos de emprender desde hace tres aÃ±os y en todo el tiempo ha demostrado ser una cliente puntual, pero solamente trabajÃ³ hasta ahora con crÃ©ditos mancomunados en su grupo "claveles", y ahora solicita un prÃ©stamo individual para realizar el pago de adelanto de la compra de una casa propia en la misma zona ya que hasta ahora esta viviendo en casa de su tÃ­o que vive en el campo. Ella anhela poder terminar de reunir el suficiente dinero y comprar su casita propia.
texts.en:
Luisa lives in the area of Alto San Antonio which is located twenty minutes from the center of the city. Her husband's name is Constantino and they have three children together. One of their children is an adult and the other two are school aged. Luisa is very hard working and makes a living selling beer at wholesale. For big festivals and parties she sometimes sells up to 500 boxes. Her husband is working as a miner for a mining company that is in the city of PotosÃ­.
Luisa has taken out other loans in the past three years and during this time has proven that she is a punctual lender. Until now she has only taken out group loans, as a part of her group "Claveles" [Carnations]. Now she is requesting an individual loan to be able to buy a home outright in the same area where she is currently living. She has been living in a house owned by her uncle, who lives in the country. She hopes to be able to finish gathering enough money to be able to buy her own home.

loan.use: to buy a home outright for herself.

loan.name: Roberto Jose

texts.es: El seÃ±or Roberto , es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su familia , su esposa labora en una empresa privada , para apoyarle con los gastos del hogar , el desde hace varios aÃ±os se dedica a la comercializaciÃ³n de vegetales y frutas de temporada , los planes hacia su familia es poder mejorar las condiciones de vida , con los dos crÃ©ditos anteriores a logrado cambiar varias partes de la vivienda , pero ahora sus deseos es poder realizar un cuarto aparte ya que su hijos va para adolecente y necesita privacidad ya que actualmente duermen todos en el mismo cuarto , pero no cuenta con muchos recursos econÃ³micos para realizar la inversiÃ³n , ya que con sus ganancias lograr cubrir gastos del hogar y cumplir con sus obligaciones .Agradece el apoyo que le brindan ya que sin estos programas de apoyo a familias humilde no podrÃ­an hacer sus sueÃ±os realidad .
texts.en: Roberto lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe with his family. His wife works for a private business to help out with the household expenses. He has been selling seasonal fruit and vegetables for several years now. His plans for his family are to improve their living conditions and with his two previous loans he has been able to change several parts of their home, but what he wants to do now is to add another bedroom. He wants to do this since his kids are becoming teenagers and they need their privacy and at the moment they all sleep together in the same room. He doesn't have a lot of money to make this investment since his earnings are just enough to cover the household expenses and his debts. He is thankful for the help he has received because without these support programs, modest families wouldn't be able to make their dreams come true.

loan.use: to buy construction materials

loan.name: Valeri

texts.es: Valeri, de 23 aÃ±os, es una mujer amable, emprendedora y trabajadora, es madre de tres hijos, Kaori de 7, Luciana de 3 y Valeria de 3 meses de nacida. Juntas viven en una casa propia en donde comparte con su pareja la alegrÃ­a de criar a sus hijas a quienes desean dar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Valeri consiste en la venta de anticuchos por las noches en la vereda de su casa, ahÃ­ prepara Ã©ste bocadillo con una salsa especial. Pero no solo este negocio es su actividad, tambiÃ©n por las maÃ±anas se va al mercado de su ciudad en donde vende zapatos, sandalias y zapatillas de manera ambulante, asimismo vende ropa y de todas las marcas. Al principio le era un poco mÃ¡s complicado debido a que tenÃ­an que salir todo el tiempo a caminar para poder vender, ahora tienen un local y le es mÃ¡s tranquilo y fÃ¡cil. Le gusta mucho lo que hace pues para ella lo primordial es el bienestar de sus hijas, ademÃ¡s le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene muchos clientes. Ahora desea seguir trabajando mucho para crecer en su negocio. Este serÃ¡ el crÃ©dito nÃºmero cuatro con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeÃ±o prÃ©stamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. AdemÃ¡s se compromete una vez mas a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprarÃ¡ ingredientes para seguir vendiendo anticuchos, ademÃ¡s de mercaderÃ­a para continuar con la venta de ropa.
texts.en: Twenty-three-year-old Valeri is a friendly, enterprising, and hardworking woman. She is the mother of three children, seven-year-old Kaori, three-year-old Luciana, and three-month-old Valeria. They live together in their own home where she and her partner share the joy of raising their daughters, whom they want to offer a better quality of life. Valeri works selling kebabs at night on the sidewalk in from of her house, where she makes this snack with a special sauce. However, this isn't her only job, rather in the mornings she also sells shoes, sandals, and slippers, as well as all brands of clothes on foot at her city's market. At first it was a little tough for her because they had to go out walking all the time to sell, but now they have a stall and it's much calmer and easier. She likes what she does a lot because, for her, the most important thing is her daughters' well-being and her business is going very well as she has many customers. Now she wants to keep working a lot to make her business grow. This will be her fourth loan with MFP and she's waiting on this small loan to be able to achieve her goals. She promises to make her payments on time once again. She will use the 1,000 nuevos soles to buy ingredients to keep selling kebabs, as well as to buy merchandise to keep selling clothing.

loan.use: to buy ingredients to make kebabs and to buy clothing to sell

loan.name: Juan Ramon

texts.es: Don Juan RamÃ³n tiene 53 aÃ±os de edad, es casado con 4 hijos con edades de 29, 26, 23 y 18 los cuales ya trabajan, el vive con su familia en CofradÃ­a, Cortes. Don Juan trabajaba como operario de maquina en una maquila, pero despuÃ©s se independizo para lograr establecer su propia barberÃ­a la cual ha visionado tener. El iniciÃ³ su negocio desde hace 20 aÃ±os brindando servicio de corte de pelo, barba y otros, tambiÃ©n ofrece a sus clientes la venta de gelatinas para el cabello, cremas de afeitar y lociones. Es su segundo prÃ©stamo con ODEF el cual lo invertirÃ¡ en la compra de productos de barberÃ­a, gelatinas, cremas etc. Para poder ofrecer a sus clientes un servicio completo y darle mayor realce a su negocio para asÃ­ aumentar mas sus ventas.
texts.en:
Juan RamÃ³, age 53, is married and has four children, ages 29, 26, 23, and 18. The children work. He lives with his family in CofradÃ­a, Cortes.
Juan worked as a machine operator in a factory, but he later became independent. He did this to establish his own barber shop, which he envisioned having. He started his business 20 years ago, and he provides services such as cutting hair, beards, and others. He also sells hair gel, aftershave, and lotions to his customers.
This is his second loan with ODEF. He will use it to buy barber products, gels, and creams, etc. He will do this in order to offer his customers a complete service and to enhance his business to increase his sales.

loan.use: to buy barber products, hair gel, and creams, etc. for his business.

loan.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es: La seÃ±ora Josefa es comerciante de una pequeÃ±a tienda de abarrotes, gaseosas, golosinas, comida rÃ¡pidas entre otros productos.
